thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com
thread.title: Brittney Sorbello
thread.title_full: HelloFresh US reviewed by Brittney Sorbello

author: Brittney Sorbello
title: Brittney Sorbello
text: At first I liked the meals, however, I cancelled my subscription and they sent me a package anyway Their customer service was completely unhelpful and rude. It might be okay if you plan to use it every week but it is TERRIBLE FOR COLLEGE STUDENTS on a limited budget who wish to do it on a week by week basis.
